headline: Did Incyte's (INCY) Leadership Shift and Pipeline Milestones Just Reshape Its Investment Narrative?
summary: Incyte recently appointed Soni Basi as Executive Vice President and Chief Human Resources Officer, succeeding Paula Swain following her retirement, with Basi bringing over 25 years of global HR experience from roles at Edelman, AIG, Allergan, The Estée Lauder Companies, and Schering-Plough. This leadership change coincides with significant operational momentum, including strong second-quarter results, FDA approval and launch of Niktimvo, and advancement of precision medicine partnerships and...
